name: Looking For Group
description:
Start as a lone adventure and attempt to take down a giant, Recruit allies to aid you in this quest however you will need gold to find friends to down such a fearsome foe. With a party of friends you become "Stronger Together"......

Space - Interact

Left Click - Attack

Has controller support but I havn't tried it.

Originally planned to have the boss actually do more than just attack, so it's a tad lack luster, but its still decent for my first jam.

Notes for next jam, start with something smaller, and get the core loop down.
